text:
rule Possible_Rogue_storage_device {
  
  meta: 
    author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "Possible_Rogue_storage_device"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Initial access"

  events:
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Windows"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type= "6416"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "PrintQueue"

  outcome:
        $risk_score = 50

  condition:
    $e
}
